Wish I could have visited this quaint little pub more during my trip. Very friendly bar tender who walked me through the beer list. Great candle-light atmosphere at night and a few seats outside as well.
Great space on the far end of Dupont. It is a bit small/cozy. Bartenders make amazing mixed drinks- true craft cocktails. Service at the bar is fast, but they take time to make your drink perfectly.
